name: css-utility-functions
description: A collection of reusable CSS custom native functions using the @function syntax

scripts.build: postcss src/index.css -o dist/index.css && node add-header.js dist/index.css
scripts.build:min: postcss src/index.css -o dist/index.min.css --env production && node add-header.js dist/index.min.css && cp dist/index.min.css docs/index.min.css
scripts.build:all: npm run build:html && npm run build && npm run build:min
scripts.version: concurrently "npm run build:html" "npm run build" "npm run build:min"
